com.jakewharton.android.actionbarsherlock
Class ActionBarMenu

java.lang.Object
  com.jakewharton.android.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarMenu
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionBarSubMenu
public class ActionBarMenu
extends Object

An implementation of the android.view.Menu interface for use in inflating menu XML resources to be added to a third-party action bar.

Author:
Jake Wharton
See Also:
com.android.internal.view.MenuBuilder}
